title: Enhancing Practical Competencies in Management Strategy: Understanding Emotional Dynamics in VR-Based Social Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and understanding of elementary education curricula
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze emotional changes occurring during social interactions in real-time through VR simulations.
Learners can explain the impact of personality types and self-regulation of emotions (SRE) strategies on VR learning experiences.
Learners can manage negative emotions in VR learning environments by utilizing reappraisal and suppression strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
